verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of Asaph <WH623>. O 'Elohim <WH430>, the heathen <WH1471> are come <WH935> <WH8804> into thine inheritance <WH5159>; thy holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964> have they defiled <WH2930> <WH8765>; they have laid <WH7760> <WH8804> Yerushalayim <WH3389> on heaps <WH5856>.

The dead bodies <WH5038> of thy servants <WH5650> have they given <WH5414> <WH8804> to be meat <WH3978> unto the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064>, the flesh <WH1320> of thy saints <WH2623> unto the beasts <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>.
Their blood <WH1818> have they shed <WH8210> <WH8804> like water <WH4325> round about <WH5439> Yerushalayim <WH3389>; and there was none to bury <WH6912> <WH8802> them.
We are become a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbours <WH7934>, a scorn <WH3933> and derision <WH7047> to them that are round about <WH5439> us.
How long, YY <WH3068>? wilt thou be angry <WH599> <WH8799> for ever <WH5331>? shall thy jealousy <WH7068> burn <WH1197> <WH8799> like fire <WH784> ?

Pour out <WH8210> <WH8798> thy wrath <WH2534> upon the heathen <WH1471> that have not known <WH3045> <WH8804> thee, and upon the kingdoms <WH4467> that have not called <WH7121> <WH8804> upon thy name <WH8034>.
For they have devoured <WH398> <WH8804> Ya`akov <WH3290>, and laid waste <WH8074> <WH8689> his dwelling place <WH5116>.

O remember <WH2142> <WH8799> not against us former <WH7223> iniquities <WH5771>: let thy tender mercies <WH7356> speedily <WH4118> prevent <WH6923> <WH8762> us: for we are brought <WH1809> very <WH3966> low <WH1809> <WH8804>.

Help <WH5826> <WH8798> us, O 'Elohim <WH430> of our salvation <WH3468>, for <WH1697> the glory <WH3519> of thy name <WH8034>: and deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> us, and purge away <WH3722> <WH8761> our sins <WH2403>, for thy name's <WH8034> sake.

Wherefore should the heathen <WH1471> say <WH559> <WH8799>, Where is their 'Elohim <WH430>? let him be known <WH3045> <WH8735> among the heathen <WH1471> in our sight <WH5869> by the revenging <WH5360> of the blood <WH1818> of thy servants <WH5650> which is shed <WH8210> <WH8803>.

Let the sighing <WH603> of the prisoner <WH615> come <WH935> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee; according to the greatness <WH1433> of thy power <WH2220> preserve <WH3498> <WH8685> thou those that are appointed <WH1121> to die <WH8546>;
And render <WH7725> <WH8685> unto our neighbours <WH7934> sevenfold <WH7659> into their bosom <WH2436> their reproach <WH2781>, wherewith they have reproached <WH2778> <WH8765> thee, O YY <WH136>.

So we thy people <WH5971> and sheep <WH6629> of thy pasture <WH4830> will give thee thanks <WH3034> <WH8686> for ever <WH5769>: we will shew forth <WH5608> <WH8762> thy praise <WH8416> to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
